TextEng: Oh, hello my lady. Your smile stunned me for a second.
Text: 아, 안녕하세요 아가씨. 잠시 미소에 넋을 잃었네요.

TextEng: I bid you farewell my lady.
Text: 그럼 안녕히 가세요 아가씨.

TextEng: Good <quarterday> to you.
Text: 좋은 <quarterday> 되세요.

TextEng: As you wish.
Text: 알겠습니다.

TextEng: My name is Tarran and it is a distinct pleasure to meet you, my lady. What may I call you?
Text: 제 이름은 타란이고, 뵙게 되어 정말 영광입니다, 아가씨. 성함이 어떻게 되시죠?

TextEng: It would be my pleasure. My name is Tarran. And what do they call you, besides perfect?
Text: 기꺼이요. 제 이름은 타란입니다. 그런데 당신처럼 완벽한 분을 뭐라고 불러야 하나요?

TextEng: You seem like a very lonely person. My name is Tarran. What is your name?
Text: 외로워 보이시네요. 제 이름은 타란입니다. 성함이 어떻게 되시죠?

TextEng: A beautiful name for a beautiful woman. I only wish I could fully appreciate such beauty on a terrible day like today.
Text: 아름다운 분에게 어울리는 아름다운 이름이군요. 이렇게 끔찍한 날만 아니라면 그 아름다움을 더 음미할 수 있을 텐데요.

TextEng: Thank you <FirstName>. I only wish I could give you all of my attention. My mind is focused on darker thoughts. What can I do for you?
Text: 고맙습니다 <FirstName>. 온전히 신경 써드리고 싶지만, 머릿속이 어두운 생각으로 가득하네요. 무엇을 도와드릴까요?

TextEng: A <lord/lady> of mystery. While I love an intrigue, today is just too bleak a moment in my life to give you proper attention. Can I help you?
Text: 신비로운 분이시군요. 저도 그런 신비함을 좋아하지만, 오늘은 제 인생에서 너무 암울한 날이라 제대로 모시기가 어렵네요. 무엇을 도와드릴까요?

TextEng: I could think of nothing more pleasant than to gaze into your eyes and converse for hours, if only it was not such a terrible day.
Text: 당신의 눈을 바라보며 몇 시간이고 이야기하는 것보다 좋은 일은 없겠지만, 이렇게 끔찍한 날만 아니라면요.

TextEng: I guess I could, although my mind is occupied with worry about this terrible day.
Text: 그래야겠죠, 이 끔찍한 날에 대한 걱정으로 머리가 가득하지만요.

TextEng: On this dark day I'm not sure I can answer any questions coherently, but I will try.
Text: 이런 어두운 날에 제대로 대답할 수 있을지 모르겠지만, 해볼게요.

TextEng: I know little of that, and my mind dwells on other dark subjects. I can answer you no better I'm afraid.
Text: 그건 잘 모르고, 제 마음은 다른 어두운 생각에 사로잡혀 있어요. 더 좋은 답을 드리기가 어렵겠네요.

TextEng: My dear <lord/lady>. While my mind is plagued with the troubles this day has brought, I am afraid my directions would be completely incoherent.
Text: 친애하는 <lord/lady>. 오늘 닥친 문제들로 머리가 복잡해서, 길 안내는 제대로 못 해드릴 것 같네요.

TextEng: I am ashamed. I was supposed to bring my little brother Neva into town to buy him a birthday present for his tenth birthday. He was so excited he kept running ahead of me.
Text: 부끄럽네요. 남동생 네바의 열 번째 생일 선물을 사주려고 마을에 데려가는 길이었어요. 너무 신나서 계속 저보다 앞서 달려갔거든요.

TextEng: I take it that you are an adventurer? Perhaps I could employ you to assist me with a serious problem?
Text: 모험가시죠? 심각한 문제를 도와달라고 부탁드려도 될까요?

TextEng: I will tell you, though I fear you may not understand.
Text: 말씀드리겠지만, 이해하지 못하실 수도 있어요.

TextEng: I imagine it is because he had his birthday money in his purse. He had 10 gold pieces to spend for his birthday. That is a lot, so the bandits probably figured he was from a wealthy home and they want to ransom him.
Text: 아마 지갑에 생일 용돈이 있어서 그런 것 같아요. 생일 선물로 쓸 금화 10개가 있었거든요. 꽤 큰 돈이라 산적들이 부잣집 아이라고 생각하고 몸값을 받으려는 것 같아요.

TextEng: Yes. I quietly followed them to a camp near some standing stones in the hills just outside of Charwood. I would have gone in myself, except for this wounded hand.
Text: 네. 조용히 뒤따라가서 그을린숲 바로 바깥 언덕의 표석 근처 캠프까지 추적했어요. 이 손만 다치지 않았다면 제가 직접 들어갔을 텐데요.

TextEng: I have 300 gold, which I would reward anyone who could save my baby brother.
Text: 금화 300개가 있는데, 동생을 구해주는 분께 드리겠어요.

TextEng: Oh, my poor brother. (sigh) I did think that maybe you would help me out. I guess I will have to find one who truly has a brave spirit.
Text: 아, 불쌍한 내 동생. (한숨) 도와주실 줄 알았는데. 진정으로 용감한 분을 찾아봐야겠네요.

TextEng: Go away if you will not even try.
Text: 도와줄 생각이 없다면 가세요.

TextEng: Your beauty is outshone only by your bravery. I must admit, that if you are able to rescue my baby brother, there are rewards besides gold that I would be willing to discuss.
Text: 당신의 아름다움은 오직 용기에만 가려지는군요. 솔직히 말하면, 동생을 구해주신다면 금화 외에 다른 보상도 의논해볼 수 있어요.

TextEng: I know Neva is being held at a bandit camp near some standing stones just outside of Charwood, but I have no idea how many people are holding him or what exactly to expect.
Text: 네바가 그을린숲 바로 바깥 표석 근처 산적 캠프에 잡혀 있다는 건 알지만, 몇 명이 지키고 있는지나 정확히 뭘 예상해야 하는지는 모르겠어요.

TextEng: Here. This ring will show Neva that I sent you. Please take care of it.
Text: 여기요. 이 반지를 보여주면 네바가 제가 보냈다는 걸 알 거예요. 잘 부탁드려요.

TextEng: Please hurry. Bring him back to me safely.
Text: 서둘러 주세요. 안전하게 데려와 주세요.

TextEng: Well met, <CUSTOM1001>. Have you had any progress? Have you found Neva yet?
Text: 반갑습니다, <CUSTOM1001>. 진전이 있나요? 네바를 찾으셨나요?

TextEng: Hello, are you with <CUSTOM1001>?
Text: 안녕하세요, <CUSTOM1001>과 함께 오신 건가요?

TextEng: Thank you so much, my bravest. I shall pray for your swift and safe return.
Text: 정말 감사합니다, 용감한 분. 빨리 무사히 돌아오시길 기도할게요.

TextEng: Bless you brave one. I shall pray for your swift and safe return.
Text: 용감한 분이시군요. 빨리 무사히 돌아오시길 기도할게요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Obviously I have hired the right <man/woman> for the job. You should be well prepared with 100 gold to assist you.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 확실히 적임자를 고용했네요. 준비를 잘 하실 수 있도록 금화 100개를 드릴게요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> How mercenary of you! I will give you the reward I have promised when you return with my brother. Now go save my brother!
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 참 타산적이시네요! 약속한 보상은 동생을 데려오시면 드릴게요. 이제 동생을 구하러 가세요!

TextEng: I can't believe how commanding you are. I hope we can discuss that later, but for now I will give you 100 gold.
Text: 이렇게 당당하시다니 믿기지 않네요. 나중에 더 얘기할 수 있으면 좋겠지만, 일단 금화 100개를 드릴게요.

TextEng: Please find him quickly. I enjoy speaking with you, but I could be much friendlier if I wasn't so worried about Neva.
Text: 빨리 찾아주세요. 당신과 대화하는 건 즐겁지만, 네바 걱정만 아니면 훨씬 더 친해질 수 있을 텐데요.

TextEng: Neva might be dead soon! Please hurry, if only so that you can claim your reward.
Text: 네바가 곧 죽을지도 몰라요! 보상을 받으시려면 서둘러 주세요.

TextEng: I notice you don't have the ring that I gave you. I certainly hope you didn't lose it... Neva might fear to join you if he thinks it is a trap.
Text: 제가 드린 반지가 없네요. 잃어버리지 않으셨길 바라요... 네바가 함정이라고 생각하면 따라오지 않을 거예요.

TextEng: I am glad you still have the ring I gave you. Be brave my hero!
Text: 제가 드린 반지를 아직 가지고 계시네요. 용감하게 싸워주세요!

TextEng: It is in the hills just outside of Charwood. If you search carefully you should find it.
Text: 그을린숲 바로 바깥 언덕에 있어요. 잘 찾아보시면 발견하실 거예요.

TextEng: I see that <CUSTOM1001> has turned Neva's ring over to you. Are you the person helping me now? What can I help you with?
Text: <CUSTOM1001>이 네바의 반지를 넘기셨군요. 이제 당신이 도와주시는 건가요? 무엇을 도와드릴까요?

TextEng: I guess my brother could use all the help he can get. How can I assist you?
Text: 동생에게 도움이 많으면 많을수록 좋겠죠. 무엇을 도와드릴까요?

TextEng: He is in a bandit camp near some standing stones in the hills just outside of Charwood.
Text: 그을린숲 바로 바깥 언덕의 표석 근처 산적 캠프에 있어요.

TextEng: Please be quick my hero. I will pray for you.
Text: 빨리 부탁드려요. 기도하고 있을게요.

TextEng: But Neva could be dead soon. I hope you will hurry, if only to claim your reward.
Text: 하지만 네바가 곧 죽을지도 몰라요. 보상을 받으시려면 서둘러 주세요.

TextEng: I'm sorry, but I really must be leaving. Excuse me.
Text: 죄송하지만, 정말 가봐야 해요. 실례합니다.

TextEng: I'm sorry. I just thought he must have asked you to help me.
Text: 죄송해요. 그분이 저를 도와달라고 부탁하셨나 싶어서요.

TextEng: I guess more help is better than less.
Text: 도움이 많으면 많을수록 좋겠죠.

TextEng: Thank you so much for offering, kind <lord/lady>, but <CUSTOM1001> has already agreed to help me.
Text: 제안해 주셔서 감사하지만, <CUSTOM1001>이 이미 도와주기로 하셨어요.

TextEng: Of course if you were the one to rescue Neva, then you would be the one to claim the reward. I would also like to add that gold is not the only reward I might offer a brave <man/woman> like you.
Text: 물론 당신이 네바를 구해주신다면 보상은 당신이 받으시겠죠. 그리고 당신처럼 용감한 분께는 금화 말고도 다른 보상도 드릴 수 있다는 점도 알아두세요.

TextEng: You must go now. Please hurry, my brother's life is dear to me.
Text: 이제 가셔야 해요. 서둘러 주세요, 동생의 목숨이 소중하니까요.

TextEng: You are back so soon? Have you found my little brother?
Text: 벌써 돌아오셨나요? 동생을 찾으셨나요?

TextEng: I have no desire to speak with you. Leave me.
Text: 당신과 얘기하고 싶지 않아요. 가세요.

TextEng: He ran over a hill, when all of a sudden I heard him scream. I ran as fast as I could to the top of the hill, but as I got close, I could hear men's voices.
Text: 네바가 언덕을 넘어 달려가는데, 갑자기 비명 소리가 들렸어요. 최대한 빨리 언덕 꼭대기로 달려갔는데, 가까이 가니까 남자들 목소리가 들리더라고요.

TextEng: Being alone, I dropped to the ground and peeked over the crest of the hill. Neva was surrounded by a group of thugs. They picked him up and carried him off, laughing to themselves.
Text: 혼자라서 땅에 엎드려 언덕 꼭대기 너머를 살펴봤어요. 네바가 악당들에게 둘러싸여 있더라고요. 네바를 들쳐 메고는 웃으면서 데려갔어요.

TextEng: I would try to rescue him myself, but I wounded my hand last year and am unable to hold a sword properly. The guards are busy with their own troubles and I need someone who can rescue him quickly.
Text: 직접 구하러 가고 싶지만, 작년에 손을 다쳐서 칼을 제대로 잡을 수가 없어요. 경비대는 자기 일로 바쁘고, 빨리 구해줄 수 있는 분이 필요해요.
